unittitle_ssm: Winston Churchill letter to Jesse Merritt
abstract_ssm: One 1943 typewritten letter from Winston Churchill to Jesse Merritt concerning a previous letter Merritt had sent about Sir George Downing's connection to 10 Downing Street and an unnamed university.
collection_ssm: Winston Churchill letter to Jesse Merritt
